projects.name: Captivate
projects.description: Captivate streamlines venture capital operations with automated fund administration, equity management, compensation solutions, and liquidity management.

projects.name: Traffic
projects.description: An AI that identifies which traffic sign appears in a photograph using a TensorFlow convolutional neural network.

projects.name: Edulink
projects.description: Developed a Django Rest Framework comprehensive School Management SaaS solution for classrooms, staff, students, and lectures & notifications.

projects.name: Homelift Ecommerce
projects.description: Integration and management of furniture products, orders, and transactions, providing a smooth and user-friendly online shopping experience.

projects.name: Injector Cisco
projects.description: A network configuration tool developed as a CLI script and desktop application using Python and PyQt for configuring Cisco devices.

projects.name: Minesweeper
projects.description: An AI that plays the classic Windows 'Minesweeper' game using a knowledge base and inference.

projects.name: C$50 Finance
projects.description: A web app to manage portfolios of stocks, allowing you to check real stock prices and portfolio values, and buy/sell stocks.
